price: Wakasema: Bila shaka umekwisha jua hatuna haki juu ya binti zako, na unayajua tunayo yataka.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا لَنَا فِي بَنَاتِكَ مِنۡ حَقّٖ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَعۡلَمُ مَا نُرِيدُ
footnotes: Wakasema: Wajua vyema ewe Lut', kuwa sisi hatuna haki ya kuwaoa binti zako, wala hatuwataki. Na wewe hapana shaka unajua tukitakacho tulipo kujia kwa haraka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū laqad ʿalim'ta mā lanā fī banātika min ḥaqqin wa-innaka lataʿlamu mā nurīdu
